      • ItemGui

        public ItemGui(org.bukkit.entity.Player buyer,
       java.lang.String title,
       int rows)
        Easy way to show the player a chest like UI/GUI
        Parameters:
        buyer - Player to make the UI for
        title - The title of the inventory UI
        rows - The number of rows the inventory should have (will have 9 columns)
